itemInfo.itemDesc: Energy of agility is contained within this Talis Armor\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect\n- Restore Max Durability : Talis Armor of Agility, Talis Armor

item.name: Iron Ingot
item.desc:
A processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Melted Iron Shards. It requires knowledge of Heating: Beginner.
※ Find Flaviano in Heidel and complete the Pure Water for an Experiment Quest to obtain related knowledge.
※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Apprentice Level 4 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Fine Soft Hide
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Drying deer, sheep, or fox hide. It requires the knowledge of Drying: Beginner.

※ Find Techthon in Heidel and complete the Need for Soft Hide! Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the related Quest, achieve Gathering Level 14 or higher. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Black Stone Powder
item.desc: A basic ingredient used in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at a Refinery through Crafting.

item.name: Red Crystal
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Rough Red Crystals found near Khuruto Cave.

item.name: Talis Armor
item.desc: This armor has reduced defense in return for better flexibility. Mostly worn by nobles.\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect

item.name: Grade 1 Armor Reform Stone
item.desc: A material used in 1st-grade armor upgrade.\n-Obtainable from: Refinery, through crafting.

item.name: Ultimate Talis Armor
item.desc: Talis Armor with maximum potential\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect\n- Restore Max Durability : Every Talis Armor

item.name: Talis Armor of Intimidation
item.desc: Energy of intimidation is contained within this Talis Armor\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect\n- Restore Max Durability : Talis Armor of Duress, Talis Armor
